title: Love on a Horse (1973) To koritsi kai t' alogo
description:
original title: To koritsi kai t' alogo
Director: Vangelis Serdaris
Writers: Vangelis Serdaris, George Zervoulakos
Stars: Anna Fonsou, Christo Spyropoulos, Giannis Argyris
Storyline:
An old artist sees his younger wife and his son from a previous marriage making incestuous love while riding her white stallion. He decides to paint the scene on a canvas and when the lovers see his new work of art they suspect that he was peeping on them while they where making love. The tension rises and when they try to leave the house, the painters madness explodes. Written by Dimitris Lampos
